description:
Samuel O'Toole and Aaron Blake are wrapping gifts for the needy and getting into the holiday spirit together. With a box of gifts to wrap, they're going to be here for some time, especially since they can't seem to wrap even one present without rubbing all over each other. OK, so maybe it wasn't such a great idea to let them wrap a box full of the new Sammy O'Toole dildos, but someone has to do it. Problem is, Aaron is a lot more interested in Samuel's package, and for his part, Samuel only seems to be interested in stuffing Aaron's, uh, stocking. So they take a break and Aaron decides instead to wrap his lips around Samuel's cock. And before too long, those dildos that were supposed to be wrapped are now finding a new home in Aaron's ass. Well not to be outdone by his own dildo, Samuel takes the situation by the balls and finishes Aaron's ass off with particular holiday gusto, gushing his nog all over Aaron's noggin in a festive, frivolous fuckfest.

Enjoy!
title: Gift Wrapped
